channel.title: Comments on: Armenian Nazook & Nutmeg Cake – Daring Bakers Challenge April 2012

item.title: By: Parita
item.dc:creator: Parita
item.description: Hey visiting your blog after a long time :) the nutmeg cake looks so delicious..I could smell it from here! btw m gonna make your butterscotch cake very soon.will let you know :) thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hey visiting your blog after a long time ðŸ™‚ the nutmeg cake looks so delicious..I could smell it from here! btw m gonna make your butterscotch cake very soon.will let you know ðŸ™‚ thanks!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: I like the sound of the spicy cake! The pastries are very cute. Did the dough rise much in the fridge?
item.content:encoded: I like the sound of the spicy cake! The pastries are very cute. Did the dough rise much in the fridge?

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: So glad you made both. The nutmeg cake is really intriguing. Fun to read your mother made it.
item.content:encoded: So glad you made both. The nutmeg cake is really intriguing. Fun to read your mother made it.

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: I especially love those nazooks :) NOM
item.content:encoded: I especially love those nazooks ðŸ™‚ NOM

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: Both of these look gorgeous! I imagine that the nutmeg cake would be just as wonderful with almonds.
item.content:encoded: Both of these look gorgeous! I imagine that the nutmeg cake would be just as wonderful with almonds.

item.title: By: thelittleloaf
item.dc:creator: thelittleloaf
item.description: I've never seen anything like those little pastries before - they look delicious. As does the cake - great challenge!
item.content:encoded: I’ve never seen anything like those little pastries before – they look delicious. As does the cake – great challenge!

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: Your desserts are beautiful! Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: Your desserts are beautiful! Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Great job! Both your cake and nazook look great! I loved the cake, and will definitely be making it again!
item.content:encoded: Great job! Both your cake and nazook look great! I loved the cake, and will definitely be making it again!
